mapper.select: SELECT pwd.key, pwd.partial_id, pwd.quantity, pwd.collation_quantity, pwd.fact_pf_key, v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pbs.spec_kind, pbs.on_shelf FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd LEFT JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key}

SELECT pwd.key, pwd.partial_id, pwd.fact_pf_key, pwd.quantity, v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pu.split_quantity, ABS(pwd.collation_quantity) * pu.split_quantity AS total_split_quantity, v_partial.spec_kind FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pwd.partial_id = pu.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id WHERE pwd.key = #{key}

SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, SUM(ABS(pwd.collation_quantity) * pu.split_quantity) AS total_split_quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pwd.partial_id = pu.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind
